name: VerdictInfo
description: Describes the threat verdict provided by human analysts and machine learning models. These fields are used to model Mandiant sources.

children.name: benign_count
children.description: Count of responses where this IoC was marked as benign.

children.name: global_customer_count
children.description: Global customer count over the last 30 days

children.name: global_hits_count
children.description: Global hit count over the last 30 days.

children.name: ioc_stats
children.description: List of IoCStats from which the verdict was generated.

children.name: malicious_count
children.description: Count of responses where this IoC was marked as malicious.

children.name: neighbour_influence
children.description: Describes the near neighbor influence of the verdict.

children.name: pwn
children.description: Whether one or more Mandiant incident response customers had this indicator in their environment.

children.name: pwn_first_tagged_time
children.description: The timestamp of the first time a pwn was associated to this entity.

children.name: response_count
children.description: Total response count across all sources.

children.name: source_count
children.description: Number of sources from which intelligence was extracted.

children.name: source_provider
children.description: Source provider giving the machine learning verdict.

children.name: verdict_time
children.description: Timestamp when the verdict was generated.
